titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 629) to grant the consent of the Congress to the Texas Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Compact.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-652, by Ms. Pryce (OH).
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 629. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 234.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 313 - 108 (Roll No. 343).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/28/1998--Introduced. Waives all points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill H.R. 629 (granting the consent of the Congress to the Texas Low-Level Radioactive Waste Disposal Compact).
